Description:
Detects potential DLL sideloading of "waveedit.dll", which is part of the Nero WaveEditor audio editing software.

Author: X__Junior (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Potential Waveedit.DLL Sideloading
Query:
sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where (image_loaded like '%\waveedit.dll' and  not ((process_path = 'c:\program files (x86)
ero
ero apps
ero waveeditor\waveedit.exe' or process_path = 'c:\program files
ero
ero apps
ero waveeditor\waveedit.exe') and (image_loaded like 'c:\program files (x86)
ero
ero apps
ero waveeditor\%' or image_loaded like 'c:\program files
ero
ero apps
ero waveeditor\%')))
